detailsSection:
This whitepaper takes a close look at the importance of application security to the oil and gas industry and discusses how a holistic approach to software development can help mitigate many of the risks these organizations face.  

The paper touches on challenges faced in the oil and gas industry as it relates to application security and discusses how a holistic approach such as the Microsoft’s Security Development Lifecycle (SDL) can help to protect an organization from cybersecurity attacks. This approach is used in companies of every size and in every industry, from small software development firms to global enterprises.
